title: Kan Lal Chhandamtu hnenah
lyrics:
Kan Lal, Chhandamtu hnenah,
Chakna neitu ber chu;
Khawngaihna leh hmangaihna,
Hmu turin lo kal r'u,
A thianghlimzia ngaihtuahin,
A ropuizia hriain;
Lo hnai rawh u, tun hnuah,
Beiseina bo lovin.

Kalvari tlanga tuarzia,
A mak em em kan ti;
Min tidam a nih ka hria,
A thu awih tur kan ni.
Thla Thianghlimin min pui se,
A chakna hmu ila;
A hming a lo thang mawi ang,
Ka rilru sualah hian.
